column1: This appeal is from the judgment, delivered by the learned Judge of the High Court of Jaffna,
dated 01.10.2014, by which, the accused-appellant, who is before this Court, was convicted

column4: for  having  murdered  one  Rasarathinam  Uthayakumar  Alias
